Analyse Log Entries¶

Classes for a custom admin command. Calling the command generates a statistical overview of the logged entries and provide insights into the user behavior requesting the Beacon.

Contents

  • Analyse Log Entries

    • beacon.management.commands.analyse_log_entries.Command

beacon.management.commands.analyse_log_entries.Command¶

class beacon.management.commands.analyse_log_entries.Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False)[source]¶

Custom commands for the admin.

add_arguments(parser)[source]¶

Defines the flags given to the command.

Parameters

parser – parser object

handle(*args, **options)[source]¶

Creates a statistical overview of the logged requests.

Parameters

  • args –

  • options – Flags for optionally create a csv file “–as_csv”, save plots in given directory “–path” and define the to be observed time period “–time_period ‘2021-10-01’ ‘2022-10-01’”

Returns

A stdout string if successful otherwise returns an error or warning.
